data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Perissinotto, Renzo, Sipek, Petr (2019): New species of Xiphoscelis Burmeister, 1842 (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Cetoniinae) from arid regions of South Africa and Namibia. ZooKeys 879: 57-89, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.879.37721, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.879.37721
